argumentText:
ARGUMENT
n

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isgrpda.1 | |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) |
| 2 |  | isgrpda.2 | |- ( ph -> G : ( X X. X ) --> X ) |
| 3 |  | isgrpda.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X /\ z e. X ) ) -> ( ( x G y ) G z ) = ( x G ( y G z ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | isgrpda.4 | |- ( ph -> U e. X ) |
| 5 |  | isgrpda.5 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> ( U G x ) = x ) |
| 6 |  | isabld.6 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> N e. X ) |
| 7 |  | isabld.7 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> ( N G x ) = U ) |
| 8 |  | isabld.8 | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( x G y ) = ( y G x ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( n = N -> ( n G x ) = ( N G x ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( n = N -> ( ( n G x ) = U <-> ( N G x ) = U ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( N e. X /\ ( N G x ) = U ) -> E. n e. X ( n G x ) = U ) |
| 12 | 6, 7, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> E. n e. X ( n G x ) = U ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 12, 8 | #P_isabloda | |- ( ph -> G e. AbelOp ) |
